verses.verse: O YY <S%H3068><s%>, thou art my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8787><s%> thee, I will praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>; for thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> wonderful <S%H6382><s%> things; thy counsels <S%H6098><s%> of old <S%H7350><s%> are faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and truth <S%H544><s%>.

For thou hast made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of a city <S%H5892><s%> an heap <S%H1530><s%>; of a defenced <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> a ruin <S%H4654><s%>: a palace <S%H759><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> to be no city <S%H5892><s%>; it shall never <S%H5769><s%> be built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Therefore shall the strong <S%H5794><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> glorify <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee, the city <S%H7151><s%> of the terrible <S%H6184><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.

For thou hast been a strength <S%H4581><s%> to the poor <S%H1800><s%>, a strength <S%H4581><s%> to the needy <S%H34><s%> in his distress <S%H6862><s%>, a refuge <S%H4268><s%> from the storm <S%H2230><s%>, a shadow <S%H6738><s%> from the heat <S%H2721><s%>, when the blast <S%H7307><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> is as a storm <S%H2230><s%> against the wall <S%H7023><s%>.

Thou shalt bring down <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the noise <S%H7588><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%>, as the heat <S%H2721><s%> in a dry place <S%H6724><s%>; even the heat <S%H2721><s%> with the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of a cloud <S%H5645><s%>: the branch <S%H2159><s%> of the terrible ones <S%H6184><s%> shall be brought low <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto all people <S%H5971><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> of fat things <S%H8081><s%>, a feast <S%H4960><s%> of wines on the lees <S%H8105><s%>, of fat things <S%H8081><s%> full of marrow <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, of wines on the lees <S%H8105><s%> well refined <S%H2212><s%> <S%H8794><s%>.

And he will destroy <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the covering <S%H3875><s%> cast over <S%H3874><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all people <S%H5971><s%>, and the vail <S%H4541><s%> that is spread <S%H5259><s%> <S%H8803><s%> over all nations <S%H1471><s%>.

He will swallow up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H8765><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> in victory <S%H5331><s%>; and the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> will wipe away <S%H4229><s%> <S%H8804><s%> tears <S%H1832><s%> from off all faces <S%H6440><s%>; and the rebuke <S%H2781><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%> shall he take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from off all the earth <S%H776><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.

And it shall be said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, Lo, this is our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; we have waited <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him, and he will save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us: this is the YY <S%H3068><s%>; we have waited <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him, we will be glad <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

For in this mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be trodden down <S%H1758><s%> <S%H8736><s%> under him, even as straw <S%H4963><s%> is trodden down <S%H1758><s%> <S%H8738><s%> for the dunghill <S%H1119><s%> <S%H4087><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H4325><s%>.

And he shall spread forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of them, as he that swimmeth <S%H7811><s%> <S%H8802><s%> spreadeth forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his hands to swim <S%H7811><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: and he shall bring down <S%H8213><s%> <S%H8689><s%> their pride <S%H1346><s%> together with the spoils <S%H698><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And the fortress <S%H4013><s%> of the high fort <S%H4869><s%> of thy walls <S%H2346><s%> shall he bring down <S%H7817><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, lay low <S%H8213><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and bring <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, even to the dust <S%H6083><s%>.
